models.ActivityEntry: A single record of an agent's response, capturing the full interaction details including message content, token usage, cost, timing, and metadata.

relationships: Each ActivityEntry belongs to one Agent (referenced by agentId, agentName, agentEmoji)
Each ActivityEntry references the model, channel, and optionally a skill used during the interaction

activities.message: I've compiled the weekly engagement report. Active users are up 12% week-over-week, with the highest growth in the mobile segment. Three key trends worth noting: push notification opt-ins increased after the onboarding flow change, average session duration dropped slightly on desktop, and the new search feature has a 34% adoption rate in its first week.
DNS propagation complete for staging.example.com. All health checks passing.

Based on the quarterly revenue data, I recommend focusing Q2 marketing spend on the enterprise segment. The SMB pipeline is healthy with organic growth, but enterprise deals have a 3.2x higher LTV and the current pipeline coverage is only 1.8x â€” below the 2.5x target. I've drafted three campaign briefs targeting enterprise personas and attached them to the shared drive.
Daily standup summary posted to #team-updates. 4 blockers flagged, 2 resolved since yesterday.

I've generated the social media assets for the product launch. The set includes 4 Instagram posts (1080x1080), 2 Twitter/X headers (1500x500), and 1 LinkedIn banner (1584x396). All files follow the updated brand guidelines with the new gradient treatment. Preview links have been sent to the #design channel for review.
Deployed v2.4.1 to production. Zero-downtime rolling update across 3 pods. Rollback artifact saved.

Customer ticket #4892 resolved. The user was experiencing intermittent 403 errors due to an expired API key rotation. I've walked them through regenerating their key and confirmed the issue is resolved. Response satisfaction: positive. Escalation: none.
Competitive analysis updated. Two new entrants identified in the mid-market segment.

Brand audit complete. I've reviewed 847 assets across the design system, website, and marketing materials. Key findings: 23 instances of the deprecated logo variant still in use, 8 pages using the old color palette, and 3 email templates with inconsistent typography. Full report with screenshots and recommended fixes is in the shared doc.

Processed 14 support tickets in the last hour. 12 resolved, 2 escalated to engineering (both related to the webhook delivery delay reported in incident #312). Average first-response time: 42 seconds. Customer satisfaction scores: 4.8/5.0 average.
SSL certificates renewed for 5 domains. All expiry dates pushed to 2027-02-19. No downtime recorded during rotation.

Content calendar for March drafted and shared. 22 posts planned across 4 channels. Highlights: product launch series (Mar 5-9), customer spotlight week (Mar 17-21), and the developer conference live coverage (Mar 28-30). All drafts are in review status awaiting approval.
